title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and including for
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Carriage of Goods and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Carriage of Goods and 

Passengers by Sea) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (carriage good passenger sea) order 2025

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and including for
heading: 2. (1) In this Order—
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order— 

“data set” means a data set specified in Annex VIII to the Directive; 

“Directive” means Directive 2009/42/EC of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 6 May 20091, as amended by Commission Decision 2010/216/EU of 
14 April 20102, Regulation (EU) No. 1090/2010 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 24 November 20103 and Commission Delegated Decision 
2012/186/EU of 3 February 20124; 

“goods” includes goods shipped to offshore installations and goods reclaimed 
from the seabed and unloaded in ports but does not include bunkers and stores 
supplied to seagoing vessels; 

“quarter” means a period of 3 months ending on 31 March, 30 June, 30 
September or 31 December in any year; 

“seagoing vessel” means a seagoing vessel other than— 

(a) 

a vessel which navigates exclusively in inland waters or in waters 
within, or closely adjacent to, sheltered waters or areas where port 
regulations apply, 

(b) 

a fish-catching vessel, 

(c) 

a fish-processing vessel, 

(d) 

a vessel for drilling and exploration, 

(e) 

(f) 

a tug, 

a pusher craft, 

1 OJ No. L 141, 6.6.2009, p. 29. 
2 OJ No. L 94, 15.4.2010, p. 33. 
3 OJ No. L 325, 9.12.2010, p. 1. 
4 OJ No. L 101, 11.4.2012, p. 5. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 11th February, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [25] 3 

(g) 

(h) 

(i) 

(j) 

a research and survey vessel, 

a dredger, 

a naval vessel, or 

a vessel used solely for non-commercial purposes; 

“survey” means the survey that is conducted by the Central Statistics Office for 
the purposes of obtaining the information specified in Articles 3, 4, 6 and 7, 
including for the purposes of compliance with the Directive in so far as it relates 
to Annex VIII thereto. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Directive has the same meaning in this Order as in the Directive, except where 
the context otherwise requires.

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and including for
heading: 3. A requirement on a port authority specified in column (2) of Part 1 of the
text_raw:
3. A requirement on a port authority specified in column (2) of Part 1 of the 
Schedule at any reference number specified in column (1) of that Part to provide, 
for the purposes of the survey, information in accordance with data sets A1, A2, 
C1, D1 and F2 relating to— 

(a) 

the goods loaded onto or unloaded from, and the passengers who 
embarked onto or disembarked from, each seagoing vessel of a 
maritime transport operator, and 

(b) 

each vessel referred to in paragraph (a), 

at each port specified in column (3) of that Part opposite the reference number 
during a quarter specified in Article 5 is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 3 requirement port authority specified column (2) part 1 schedule reference number specified column (1) part provide purpose survey information accordance data set a1 a2 c1 d1 f2 relating to-- (a) good loaded onto unloaded passenger embarked onto disembarked seagoing vessel maritime transport operator (b) vessel referred paragraph (a) port specified column (3) part opposite reference number quarter specified article 5 hereby prescribed

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and including for
heading: 4. A requirement on a port authority specified in column (2) of Part 2 of the
text_raw:
4. A requirement on a port authority specified in column (2) of Part 2 of the 
Schedule at any reference number specified in column (1) of that Part to provide, 
for the purposes of the survey, information in accordance with data sets A1, A2, 
C1 and F2 relating to— 

(a) 

the goods loaded onto or unloaded from each seagoing vessel of 
a maritime transport operator, and 

(b) 

each vessel referred to in paragraph (a), 

at each port specified in column (3) of that Part opposite the reference number 
during a quarter specified in Article 5 is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 4 requirement port authority specified column (2) part 2 schedule reference number specified column (1) part provide purpose survey information accordance data set a1 a2 c1 f2 relating to-- (a) good loaded onto unloaded seagoing vessel maritime transport operator (b) vessel referred paragraph (a) port specified column (3) part opposite reference number quarter specified article 5 hereby prescribed

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and including for
heading: 5. The port authorities in relation to which a requirement to provide
text_raw:
5. The port authorities in relation to which a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed under Article 3 or 4 shall provide the information 
concerned quarterly, and in relation to the immediately preceding quarter, in the 
period from 1 January 2025 to 1 October 2029.
text_norm: 5 port authority relation requirement provide information prescribed article 3 4 shall provide information concerned quarterly relation immediately preceding quarter period 1 january 2025 1 october 2029

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and including for
heading: 6. A requirement on a port authority specified in column (2) of Part 1 or 2
text_raw:
6. A requirement on a port authority specified in column (2) of Part 1 or 2 
of the Schedule at any reference number specified in column (1) of that Part to 
provide, for the purposes of the survey, information in accordance with data sets 
A3, B1 and E1 relating to— 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [25] 

(a) 

the goods loaded onto or unloaded from, and the passengers who 
embarked onto or disembarked from, each seagoing vessel of a 
maritime transport operator, and 

(b) 

each vessel referred to in paragraph (a), 

at each port specified in column (3) of that Part opposite the reference number 
during a year specified in Article 8 is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 6 requirement port authority specified column (2) part 1 2 schedule reference number specified column (1) part provide purpose survey information accordance data set a3 b1 e1 relating to-- 4 25 (a) good loaded onto unloaded passenger embarked onto disembarked seagoing vessel maritime transport operator (b) vessel referred paragraph (a) port specified column (3) part opposite reference number year specified article 8 hereby prescribed

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and including for
heading: 7. A requirement on a port authority specified in column (2) of Part 3 of the
text_raw:
7. A requirement on a port authority specified in column (2) of Part 3 of the 
Schedule at any reference number to provide, for the purposes of the survey, 
information in accordance with data set A3 relating to— 

(a) the goods loaded onto or unloaded from, and the passengers who 
embarked onto or disembarked from, each seagoing vessel of a maritime 
transport operator, and 

(b) each vessel referred to in paragraph (a), 

at each port specified in column (3) of that Part opposite the reference number 
during a year specified in Article 8 is hereby prescribed.
text_norm: 7 requirement port authority specified column (2) part 3 schedule reference number provide purpose survey information accordance data set a3 relating to-- (a) good loaded onto unloaded passenger embarked onto disembarked seagoing vessel maritime transport operator (b) vessel referred paragraph (a) port specified column (3) part opposite reference number year specified article 8 hereby prescribed

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and including for
heading: 8. The port authorities in relation to whom a requirement to provide
text_raw:
8. The port authorities in relation to whom a requirement to provide 
information is prescribed under Article 6 or 7 shall provide the information 
concerned annually, and in relation to the immediately preceding year, in the 
period from 2025 to 2029. 

 
 
 
 [25] 5
text_norm: 8 port authority relation requirement provide information prescribed article 6 7 shall provide information concerned annually relation immediately preceding year period 2025 2029 25 5
